name: 凯蒂·玛格丽特·霍尔
name_full: 凯蒂·玛格丽特·霍尔 Katie Margaret Hall
introduction: Katie is a born and bred Londoner, and began her film production career at the University of Warwick (1998-2001). After extras appearances and numerous TV quiz show episodes (Fifteen to One, Breakaway, The Chase), Katie took the plunge as creator of the first ever UK LBQ web series, 'She's in London'; not only writing the screenplay but taking on the role of show-runner.Since then, Katie has become an established supporting artist with background roles in shows such as Motherland (BBC 2) and THe Man Who Fell To Earth (Showtime) and the upcoming DC feature Aquaman 2.Katie is producer for the independent feature 'Under the Influencer'.
